action.action-desc: Mr. Holding (for himself and Mr. Roskam) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to limit the instances in which official time may be granted to employees of the Internal Revenue Service, and for other purposes.

section.header: Limitation on official time for Internal Revenue Service employees

subsection.text: Section 7131 of title 5, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following:
The authority provided under subsection (d) shall not be available to the Internal Revenue Service.
Subsection (d) of section 7131 of title 5, United States Code, is amended by inserting and subsection (e) after preceding subsections.
The amendments made by subsections (a) and (b) shall apply to any collective bargaining agreement entered into after the date of enactment of this section.
